articles.title: Orsted Takes $1.7 Billion Hit on Mounting Costs of Offshore Wind - Bloomberg
articles.description: Orsted A/S shares slumped after it recorded a $1.7 billion hit on its earnings as the cost of building offshore wind farms in the US keeps rising, complicating the company’s efforts to expand the green technology from Europe.

articles.title: Carrie Underwood Sings A Cappella At Donald Trump Inauguration After Tech Glitch – Watch - Deadline

articles.content:
Carrie Underwood sung “America the Beautiful” during the inauguration of Donald Trump on Monday, performing it a cappella after a tech glitch over the piped-in music couldn’t be resolved.
